scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:IdeaStatusHistory}
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="IdeaLinks_DeleteIdeaStatus">Delete</resource> <resource name="IdeaLinks_EditIdeaStatus">Edit</resource> <resource name="IdeaStatusHistory">Ideas - Idea Status History</resource> <resource name="IdeaStatusHistory_Description">Shows the history of status changes on the current idea.</resource> <resource name="instructions">Below is the history of changes to this idea's status. <a href="{0}">Return to the idea</a>.</resource> <resource name="more">More</resource> <resource name="NoNote">No note was provided with this status update.</resource> <resource name="title">{0}: Status History</resource> <resource name="VerifyIdeaStatusDeletion">Are you sure you want to delete this status?</resource> </language>
